name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of extensive experience in **cloud** solutions and **DevOps** practices, adept at leveraging **hybrid clouds** and **virtualization** technologies. Proficient in ensuring **high availability** through robust infrastructure design and implementation strategies, contributing to seamless data **backup** and **storage** solutions. Specialized in integrating **artificial intelligence** functionalities to enhance system efficiency and automation.

Experienced in full-stack development using **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with a strong command of frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I hold a proven track record of leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms within the healthcare and financial sectors and implementing **container technologies** for efficient application deployment. My expertise in crafting solutions that comply with industry standards, including HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensures secure and reliable operations.

experience.responsibilities:
Designed and implemented **cloud**-based solutions ensuring **high availability** and **backup** strategies for healthcare and financial platforms, leveraging tools such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Kubernetes** (e.g., EKS/AKS).
Architected microservices using **container technologies** such as **Docker** to enhance scalability and reliability in application deployment, achieving a **30%** increase in system performance.
Developed and maintained robust **storage** solutions with databases like **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**, optimizing support for **millions** of records and enabling efficient data retrieval for analytics.
Integrated **artificial intelligence** capabilities within applications, using ML frameworks like **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch**, which improved operational efficiency by **25%** through smart predictive analytics.
Led the implementation of enterprise-level **DevOps** practices, utilizing tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI** to streamline deployment processes, reducing release time by **40%**.
Configured and optimized **hybrid clouds** solutions to respond to dynamic workloads across multiple environments, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and GDPR.
Executed **backup** and disaster recovery strategies that ensured minimal downtime across various applications, achieving a **99.9%** uptime.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance application architecture, employing **virtualization** techniques for optimized resource management and cost reduction.
Produced detailed documentation and conducted training sessions on best practices for **cloud** infrastructure management, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement among the engineering teams.

• Designed and implemented **high availability** architectures for financial platforms utilizing **cloud** services such as Azure, enhancing system reliability and uptime by **99%**.
• Leveraged **DevOps** practices to automate CI/CD pipelines, reducing deployment times by **50%** and improving overall software development efficiency.
• Integrated **container technologies** like Docker and Kubernetes to streamline application deployment and management, while achieving scalability in a **hybrid cloud** environment.
• Developed and modernized financial applications using a microservices-based architecture in **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing maintainability for systems processing over **1 million** transactions a day.
• Built user-centric front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to design responsive interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Created real-time monitoring tools and analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, allowing operations teams to visualize and analyze transaction flows effectively.
• Established robust event-driven architectures with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, enabling real-time transaction processing and compliance notification workflows.
• Engineered ETL pipelines utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for batch and real-time ingestion of **financial data**, handling inputs from internal and **third-party** sources.
• Innovated AI/ML-driven fraud detection frameworks using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, resulting in a **30%** decrease in fraudulent transactions through advanced pattern analysis.
• Developed machine learning pipelines for critical business operations such as credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, ensuring real-time decision-making capabilities embedded in backend services.

Engineered high-availability solutions using **cloud** technologies, ensuring optimal service uptime and performance for a global e-commerce platform.
Designed and optimized backend microservices leveraging **container technologies** such as Docker and Kubernetes, achieving scalability and resilience across transaction-heavy modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Implemented comprehensive backup and storage strategies to safeguard critical data, utilizing solutions that support hybrid clouds for data redundancy and disaster recovery.
Leveraged **artificial intelligence** techniques to enhance product recommendation systems, driving personalized shopping experiences and improving conversion rates based on user interactions.
Applied **DevOps** practices to streamline the development lifecycle, integrating CI/CD pipelines for seamless deployment and minimal downtime during updates with effective rollback strategies.
Utilized **virtualization** to optimize resource allocation, achieving a 25% cost reduction in infrastructure expenditure while maintaining service quality and availability.
Created robust and responsive user interfaces using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, ensuring a smooth customer journey on both web and mobile, with an emphasis on performance and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Engineered real-time features with **WebSockets**, and leveraged **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for event-driven architecture, ensuring instantaneous updates for orders and inventory across the platform.
Developed secure payment processing systems integrating **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, implementing PCI-compliant workflows to protect sensitive transaction data.
Established role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 protocols, ensuring robust security and GDPR compliance for customer and admin access.
